sentence.Network_en: Science and technology have come to pervade every aspect of our lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学和技术已经渗透到我们生活的每一个方面.

sentence.Network_en: Order, proportion, and fitness pervade the universe.
sentence.Network_cn: 秩序 、 均衡和公理遍及宇宙.

sentence.Network_en: According to Spender's research, double standards pervade the classroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据斯彭德的研究, 课堂教学普遍实行双重标准.

list.abs: 饱览了：feast one's eyes on...花香袭人：pervading perfume生机勃勃，气象万千：vitality and variety.
an unpleasant smell pervades the house .一种难闻的气味弥漫了全屋。
combined , these elements provide an idyllic haven a luxuriant tropical garden a pervading sense of tranquility and luxurious relaxation .这些要素结合起来，给繁茂的热带花园带来了田园诗般的避风港，和宁静和奢华休闲的普遍意义。

show according to investigation , divide city of individual out-of-the-way province , the car line of business that rent already pervaded countrywide each district , already registered …据调查显示，除个别偏远省市，汽车租赁业已遍及全国各地，已注册的…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (also in the sense 'traverse'): from Latin pervadere, from per- 'throughout' + vadere 'go'

entry.def: If something pervades a place or thing, it is a noticeable feature throughout it.

example.ex: The smell of sawdust and glue pervaded the factory...
example.tran: 工厂里弥漫着锯屑和胶水的气味。

example.ex: ...the corruption that pervades every stratum of the country...
example.tran: 渗透到社会各阶层的腐败

sentences.sentence: "An atmosphere of distrust has permeated this administration"

auth_sentence.content: Washes of colour pervade, but always with a sprightly drumming backbeat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Washes of colour pervade, but always with a sprightly drumming backbeat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Washes of colour pervade, but always with a sprightly drumming backbeat.

auth_sentence.content: I hope this kind of misinformation doesn't pervade the print edition.
auth_sentence.res_content: I hope this kind of misinformation doesn't pervade the print edition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hope this kind of misinformation doesn't pervade the print edition.

auth_sentence.content: Its characters, its landmarks and its atmosphere also pervade Pullman's work.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its characters, its landmarks and its atmosphere also pervade Pullman's work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its characters, its landmarks and its atmosphere also pervade Pullman's work.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
e出+vade走→走出去→逃避
in进入+vade走→走进去→入侵
per全部+vade走→走遍,遍及

sentences.en: the greed that pervades modern society
sentences.cn: 现代社会中普遍存在的贪婪

sentences.en: A retrospective influence pervaded the whole performance.
sentences.cn: 怀旧的影响弥漫了整个演出。

sentences.en: An unpleasant smell pervades the house.
sentences.cn: 一种难闻的气味弥漫了全屋。
